name: Platform Jump [Godot Course Assignment]
description:
My implementation of the Platform Jump game for the Godot 3 Complete Developer Course - 2D and 3D course at Udemy by Guilherme Oliveira.

Original project as developed during the course on github.

The license for the assets used are in the assets_license.txt the remaining assets were provided by the instructor.

If you want to learn Godot, make sure to try out the course.

For the next version I'll add the versus AI mode and fix bugs.
